level.heading: Authority of Mayor.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall restrict the authority of the Mayor of the District of Columbia to inspect, condemn, denature, destroy, seize, or remove food for human consumption pursuant to § 22-2903.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-39, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-301.
